name: I Hate Turrets (DanielOschepkov)
description:
Play as a turret, who hates other turrets (Turret: Become Human, he-he) in this retro-styled first person shooter!

This is the first demo version, which will be updated in future and many new things will come =]

GAMEPLAY AND CHARACTERS

few different types of enemies and retro graphics style (but in 3D). Player can move only forward, but that will not stop you!

DONT LET ENEMIES TO CAPTURE ALL YOUR FLAGS!!!!!

STORYLINE

The game has not any hard and complex story line, just play as a turret against other turrets and have fun =]

CREATOR

The game created by SpeakerFish

Powered by Unity

CONTROLS

W - Move

LMB - Shoot
